DEFAULT ENGLISH:
A cronjob performs maintenance on regular basis (once a day is preferred) to keep this system running fast and smooth.
Things that happen are for example: emptying caches, deleting old users.
It also performs necessary actions that need to happen without user input.
For example: checking for intrusion, sending notification emails, sending invoices to clients etc.

Examples:
TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE:
A cronjob performs maintenance on regular basis (once a day is preferred) to keep this system running fast and smooth.
Things that happen are for example: emptying caches, deleting old users.
It also performs necessary actions that need to happen without user input.
For example: checking for intrusion, sending notification emails, sending invoices to clients etc.

Examples:

DEFAULT ENGLISH:
Point the Linux cronjob manager or Windows task scheduler to url:

[url]
TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE:
Point the Linux cronjob manager or Windows task scheduler to url:

[url]

DEFAULT ENGLISH: You can trigger the Cronjob also manually with the button below:

DEFAULT ENGLISH: Recommendation: Run CronJob ASAP! The last one ran more than 24 hours ago.
TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE: Recommendation: Run CronJob ASAP! The last one ran more than 24 hours ago.

DEFAULT ENGLISH:
The installer installs, updates and removes the installation of [applicationname].
To use the installer, it needs to be enabled and you need a password to prevent others from using it.

Disable the installer when you don't use it to prevent malicious actors manipulating and removing data from the system.
TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE:
The installer installs, updates and removes the installation of [applicationname].
To use the installer, it needs to be enabled and you need a password to prevent others from using it.

Disable the installer when you don't use it to prevent malicious actors manipulating and removing data from the system.

DEFAULT ENGLISH:
Disable the installer for security reasons when you are not actively using it.
You can always enable it when you actually need it.
TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE:
Disable the installer for security reasons when you are not actively using it.
You can always enable it when you actually need it.
